Control

Enjoy the convenience of a modern and expressive Kubernetes API to manage an entire cluster of applications, gateways and service proxies

Connect

Interconnect services, databases, storage, legacy apps and APIs and transparently convert between protocol encapsulations

Finetune

Load-balance traffic across any number of backends, apply access control rules, automatically retry and timeout failed connections

Observe

Observe traffic as it flows through the network, monitor application statistics, log and kill individual streams with a single command
